title: Developers experience improved inner loop performance via MS BUILD evaluation optimizations
body:
Possible areas of Evaluation improvements:
- JIT or transpille Evaluation
- [ ] [#8412](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/8412)
- Better caching

# Justification
1. Improving Evaluation performance would have great impact on customers as it is called very frequently, often caused UI delay, and takes noticeable time.
1. Alings to OKR "Generate 8 1P 'perf gains/COGS reduction' endorsements from moving to .NET 5+"
